creator: lucasnlm
descriptionHtml:
Antimine is a puzzle game minesweeper-like. The objective is: flag the spaces with mines to make the field a safer place without explode any of them.

You win the game when you've flagged every mine in the minefield. Be careful not to trigger one!

---

Features:

- Takes up little storage space
- It can be played without Internet
- 4 difficulty levels
- Make your own level
- Night mode
- Saves the game automatically
- Place flags to mark mines
- Place questions to mark questionable places
- Open multiple places by pressing the numbers
- Place flags automatically when needed
- Share the game
- Play with split screen
- Accessibility: increase the area of ​​the square
- Accessibility: screen reader

---

title: Minesweeper - Antimine

container.value:
Av. Doutor Pereira Barbosa, 266, AP 54A
Bairro Areão, 12060-670
Taubaté, São Paulo

creator: lucasnlm
descriptionHtml:
Test your reasoning power on a challenging puzzle game where you have to solve a minefield without exploding any mine.
This is a minimalist and modern version of the classic Minesweeper.

Are you able to clear a minefield? Let’s go!

OBJECTIVE
It's like Minesweeper. You win the game when you've flagged every mine in the minefield. Be careful not to trigger one!

NO NEED TO GUESS
This game has an algorithm that always creates solvable minefields. You won't have to guess where the last mine is!

GAME LEVELS
Just like Minesweeper, this game has different levels: Beginner, Intermediate, and Expert. But it also has a unique progressive mode that gets harder when you win.

CUSTOM LEVEL
If the standard modes aren't enough, you can create your level difficulty!

THEMES
Antimine has more than 15 themes (including light, dark, and AMOLED). And soon more will be added!

MINIMALIST
Clean look and feel: a minimalist visual and also lightweight app size (less than 9MB).

TUTORIAL
Don't you know how to play Minesweeper? No problem, you can play our tutorial level and enable Tips on settings.

STATISTICS
Check your results and development.

GAME ASSISTANT
The game will automatically flag the squares you isolated.

CUSTOMIZATION
You can change the game to make it like you want to.
Example: Help, animations, haptic feedback, question mark.

CONTROLS
It supports four different control schemes. Example: flag using tap or long press.

ACHIEVEMENTS AND LEADERBOARDS
You have eight achievements to unlock and different leaderboards to share with your friends.

ACCESSIBILITY
You can customize this game to your needs: change the squares size, radius, touch timing, and screen reader support.
We are always trying to improve our accessibility settings. If something is missing, give us feedback!

ANDROID FOCUSED APP
It supports cool Android features like split-screen, shortcuts, sharing, system theme, and always supporting the latest version.

ONLINE OR OFFLINE
You don't need to be online to play the game!

AUTO-SAVE
You can start a game and continue it later! It will auto-save your game.

Enjoy.

title: Antimine: free minesweeper

container.value:
Av. Doutor Pereira Barbosa, 266, AP 54A
Bairro Areão, 12060-670
Taubaté, São Paulo

creator: Among Puzzles
descriptionHtml:
Test your reasoning power on a challenging puzzle game where you have to solve a minefield without exploding any mine.
This is a minimalist and modern version of the classic Minesweeper.

Are you able to clear a minefield? Let’s go!

OBJECTIVE
It's like Minesweeper. You win the game when you've flagged every mine in the minefield. Be careful not to trigger one!

NO NEED TO GUESS
This game has an algorithm that always creates solvable minefields. You won't have to guess where the last mine is!

GAME LEVELS
Just like Minesweeper, this game has different levels: Beginner, Intermediate, and Expert. But it also has a unique progressive mode that gets harder when you win.

CUSTOM LEVEL
If the standard modes aren't enough, you can create your level difficulty!

THEMES
Antimine has more than 15 themes (including light, dark, and AMOLED). And soon more will be added!

MINIMALIST
Clean look and feel: a minimalist visual and also lightweight app size (less than 9MB).

TUTORIAL
Don't you know how to play Minesweeper? No problem, you can play our tutorial level and enable Tips on settings.

STATISTICS
Check your results and development.

GAME ASSISTANT
The game will automatically flag the squares you isolated.

CUSTOMIZATION
You can change the game to make it like you want to.
Example: Help, animations, haptic feedback, question mark.

CONTROLS
It supports four different control schemes. Example: flag using tap or long press.

ACHIEVEMENTS AND LEADERBOARDS
You have eight achievements to unlock and different leaderboards to share with your friends.

ACCESSIBILITY
You can customize this game to your needs: change the squares size, radius, touch timing, and screen reader support.
We are always trying to improve our accessibility settings. If something is missing, give us feedback!

ANDROID FOCUSED APP
It supports cool Android features like split-screen, shortcuts, sharing, system theme, and always supporting the latest version.

ONLINE OR OFFLINE
You don't need to be online to play the game!

AUTO-SAVE
You can start a game and continue it later! It will auto-save your game.

Enjoy.
descriptionShort: Play the best minesweeper and rediscover the most popular logic game ever!

title: Antimine: no guess minesweeper

container.value:
Av. Doutor Pereira Barbosa, 266, AP 54A
Bairro Areão, 12060-670
Taubaté, São Paulo

creator: Amazing Puzzles
descriptionHtml:
A free and offline Minesweeper game.

Test your reasoning power on a challenging puzzle game where you have to solve a minefield without exploding any mine.
This is a free, minimalist, and modern version of the classic Minesweeper.

Are you able to clear a minefield? Let’s go!

NO NEED TO GUESS
This game has an algorithm that creates solvable minefields. You won't have to guess where the last mine is!

GAME LEVELS
Just like Minesweeper, this game has different levels: Beginner, Intermediate, Expert, and Master. It also has a unique progressive mode that gets harder when you win.

CUSTOMIZABLE
You can create custom levels, change the default control, colors and more!
Example: Help, animations, haptic feedback, question mark.

THEMES
Antimine has more than 20 themes (including light, dark, and AMOLED). And soon more will be added!

MINIMALIST
Clean look and feel: a minimalist visual and also lightweight app size.

TUTORIAL
Don't you know how to play Minesweeper? No problem, you can play our tutorial level and enable Tips on settings.

STATISTICS
Check your results and development.

GAME ASSISTANT
The game will automatically flag the squares you isolated.

CONTROLS
It supports four different control schemes. Example: flag using tap or long press.

ACHIEVEMENTS AND LEADERBOARDS
You have eight achievements to unlock and different leaderboards to share with your friends.

ONLINE OR OFFLINE
You don't need to be online to play the game!

AUTO-SAVE
You can start a game and continue it later! It will auto-save your game.

Enjoy.

ONLINE OR OFFLINE
You don't need to be online to play the game!

AUTO-SAVE
You can start a game and continue it later! It will auto-save your game.

Enjoy.

creator: Amazing Puzzles
descriptionHtml:
Test your logical reasoning skills with this puzzle game, where your objective is to safely navigate a minefield without triggering any explosives.
Experience a sleek and contemporary twist on the timeless classic, Minesweeper.

Are you up for the challenge? Let's go!

Objective:
Similar to the iconic Minesweeper, your goal is to find all mines in a minefield while avoiding accidental detonations.

No Guessing:
Our game features an intelligent algorithm that guarantees solvable minefields, eliminating the need for guesswork.
Say goodbye to uncertainty. You only need to find the patterns.

Diverse Game Levels:
Many different difficulty levels: Beginner, Intermediate, Expert, Master, and Legend.
You can also challenge yourself with our unique progressive mode, that gets harder when you complete a game.

Customizable Experience:
Craft your gaming experience to perfection. Modify the game to suit your preferences.

Immersive Themes:
Antimine offers a wide array of themes, including light, dark, and AMOLED options. You can also adjust the theme with your favorite color.

Minimalist Design:
Enjoy a clean and lightweight gaming experience with our minimalist visual design.

Track Your Progress:
Monitor your gameplay results and development through our comprehensive statistics feature.

Game Assistant:
The game automatically flags the squares you've isolated, ensuring a smoother gaming experience.

Multiple Control Options:
Select from four distinct control schemes, such as flagging with a simple tap or a long press, providing a control method that suits your style.

Achievements and Leaderboards:
Unlock achievements and share your accomplishments with friends on various leaderboards.

Offline:
No internet connection? No problem!

Auto-Save Feature:
The game automatically saves your progress. You can also replay an older game!

Enjoy!
